column4: Hi, I m trying to install a LDAP server and I think that I have scrap the default configuration file and I'm not able to repair it. So If any body can help me ..

The problem is that I'm not able to start slapd without an error in the config file about the "rootdn" parameters. Here the line : rootdn "cn=admin,dc=entreprisesmd,dc=com", Also, I fallow the this HOWTO that invite me to supress all content of /var/lib/ldap. It's it a problem ?
